Own Box is a UK Hosting provider that offer Shared Hosting, Dedicated Servers, Windows and Linux SSD VPS Hosting powered by KVM. Own Box KVM SSD VPS Hosting comes with Anti DDoS Protection, Snapshot Backups, Control Panel, ability to upload your own ISO images and a list of over 20 distributions to install.
